original_title: Emmanuelle - The Private Collection: The Sex Lives Of Ghosts
overview: Old friends of Emmanuelle’s visit her at the haunted villa she has rented for the summer. After holding a séance, the ghosts of the previous owner and his mistresses begin to possess the group, and open them up to the possibilities of love that lies dormant in the group.
title: Emmanuelle - The Private Collection: The Sex Lives Of Ghosts
